active_learning.discussion_prompt: Evaluate the trade-offs of using the Shared Assessments Framework versus custom TPRM assessments in resource-constrained organizations. Cite recent supply chain breaches like SolarWinds and discuss how the framework's SIG Questionnaire and CAP could mitigate similar risks.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
